thread.section_title: LEDSupply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LEDSupply | ledsupply.com
thread.title: Sharon

author: Sharon
title: Sharon
text: We had our kitchen cabinets refaced, which eliminated the "lip" where I used to hide traditional light strips. I was so pleased when I found this product - Customer Service was helpful in answering my questions and helping me decide on the right light. I gave this 4 stars because of the poor adhesion of the backing- the paper that covered the self stick area peeled off before we were ready to apply it. It would not adhere. We ultimately purchased a roll of thin double side tape , and after some manipulation it well positioned now. I love the appearance and the quality of this item.
